this wasarak pawathi yuddhaya nima kota dan siduwana sanwardhanaya ha janathawata athi wasi pilibanda katha nokara manawa himikam kadawana bawata lokayata boru prachara gena yana rajya nowana sanwidhana eyin iwath wi sanasa wani janatha sewayata kapa wanne nam eya itha honda deyak yayi janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.siyalu jathin, siyalu aagamikayan sahajiwanayen jiwath wana rate manawa himikam kadawana bawata boru prachara gena yama sambandhawa thama mawithayata path wana bawath janadhipathiwaraya prakasha kaleya.widuru gewalwala sita apata gal gasana demala dayasporawata apa mathak wi aththe wasara thihaka yuddhaya nima kala pasuwa bawa penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya this wasaraka yuddhayak nima wi janathawa sahajiwanayen yukthawa jiwath wana aakaraya ee ayata penene nathi bawa pawasiya.this wasaraka thrasthawadaya nima kirimath samanga ada uthure menma dakuneth nidahase awida yannata awasthawa uda wi athi bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya sinhala, demala, muslim siyalu jathin ada sahajiwanayen jiwath wana bawa prakasha kaleya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha mese prakasha kale kagalla, sanasa sarasawiya wiwrutha kirime awasthawata eeye (26) ekwemini.jathyanthara mattame upadhi pirinamana sanasa sarasawiya wiwrutha kirima, kagalla janathawata idam oppu pirinamima, kagalu balika widyalayiya gruhastha kridagaraya wiwrutha kirima, kagalla wikalpa margaya ha nidahas mawatha wiwrutha kirima, hitapu jyeshta deshapalanagnyayaku wana pi. bi. ji. kalugalla mahathage piliruwa nirawaranaya kirima, kagalla shantha joshap balikawe pihinum thatakaya sisu ayithiyata path kirima, galigamuwa jathika pasale mahindodaya widyagaraya wiwrutha kirima saha ambaanpitiya pihiti nawikaranaya kala kaptan dosan bangalawa wiwrutha kirima yana uthsawa awasthawan janadhipathithumage pradhanathwayen eeye pawathwina.dayata kirula 2014 saha hata haya wani jathika nidahas dinaya nimiththen kagalla disthrikkaye sanwardhana wyapruthi rasak janatha ayithiyata path kirimata sapamini janadhipathithuma piliganima sandaha disthrikkaya pura jathika dhaja saha suba pathum banar, postar saha thorana rasak pradarshanaya kara thibuni.
meya pasugiya kalaye ekathu kala agaya matha badu anupatha ihala nanwimata erehiwa pana nanguna wirodhathawalinda nirupanaya wiya.
